text:
@GovMurphy Absurd false statement from @GovMurphy:
The evidence is overwhelming and the experts are
clear: #COVID19 is more lethal inside than outside.
~~
The virus is just a lethal regardless of where one
contracts it! Now, potential for infection on the
other hand...
